intro_text: You catch the scent of a mouse nearby.

success_text.unscathed_common: You locate the mouse and begins to stalk. The mouse nibbles on a seed, unaware of the hunting cat. You waggle your haunches and leap, pinning the mouse beneath a paw as you make the killing bite.
success_text.unscathed_rare: You pinpoint the location of the prey and begins creeping forward. You're almost within pouncing distance when the mouse suddenly bolts. With a lash of your tail, you leap after the mouse, barely snagging it before it reaches a burrow. You purr in satisfaction as prey-blood hits your tongue.
